data.title: TEDxNITH
data.meta_description: TED.com, home of TED Talks, is a global initiative about ideas worth spreading via TEDx, The Audacious Project, TED Books, TED Conferences, TED-Ed and more.
data.text:
Ar. Monish Siripurapu

Monish Kumar Siripurapu is a practicing Architect from New Delhi. He graduated from the School of Planning and Architecture (SPA), Delhi in 2009 and went on to start Ant Studio in 2010. Monish is a Tata scholar and received the prestigious JN Tata scholarship in 2015 for his PG Diploma in Robotic Fabrication from Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia (IAAC), Spain.

Ar. Nancy Charaya

Nancy Charaya is the co-founder of Anthill Creations.They are architects from IIT Kharagpur. Pooja (CEO) and Nancy, left their regular nine to five jobs to “bring back play”. Their startup Anthill Creations has been selected by N S Raghavan Centre for Entrepreneurial Learning (NSCERL), IIM Bangalore for the social incubation program supported by Michael and Susan Dell foundation.

Ar. Pooja Rai

Pooja Rai is the CEO of Anthill Creations which she co-founded along with Nancy Charaya and three of her batchmates. They are architects from IIT Kharagpur and these two girls, Pooja and Nancy, left their regular nine to five jobs to “bring back play”. Their startup Anthill Creations has been selected by N S Raghavan Centre for Entrepreneurial Learning (NSCERL), IIM Bangalore for the social incubation program supported by Michael and Susan Dell foundation.

Arihant Verma

Arihant Verma is an alumnus of National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur. He is a full stack web developer and a poet. He loves teaching what he learns.

Dr. Gaurav Deka

Dr. Gaurav Deka is known as a Transpersonal Regression Therapist. Though he has a background in psychodynamic psychotherapy and cognitive neuroscience, his most favorite and practiced skill is to take people to past lives. Because he found the stethoscope is too heavy to be hanging around his neck, and to break away from the mundane life in the hospital, he studied Reincarnation and Regression Therapy; that which he combines as a holistic practice with his medical and psychological base.

Dr. Saroj Thakur

Dr.Saroj Thakur has been teaching at NIT Hamirpur from the last 31 years and is a fellow at Indian Institute of Advance Studies ,Shimla. She is a woman full of life, a blogger, a trekker and a photographer.

Tafheem Masudi

Tafheem is a neurobiologist and did his PhD from FMI, Novartis in Basel, Switzerland. Currently he is a post doctoral fellow in neurobiology at NCBS/INSTEM, Bangalore. He has eight years of cutting edge research experience in India and abroad. Tafheem has contributed towards understanding the cross-talk within neuronal elements of the olfactory system and motor circuits. His research has been fundamental in deciphering structure–function relationships in the brain.
